# Kanban Board - Mixed Statuses for Cleanup Testing

- [x] **[TASK-001]** First completed task
  - Description: This task is done
  - Priority: HIGH
  - Dependencies: none

- [*] **[TASK-002]** Failed task
  - Description: This task failed
  - Priority: MEDIUM
  - Dependencies: none

- [ ] **[TASK-003]** Pending task
  - Description: Not yet started
  - Priority: LOW
  - Dependencies: none

- [x] **[TASK-004]** Second completed task
  - Description: Also done
  - Priority: CRITICAL
  - Dependencies: TASK-001

- [=] **[TASK-005]** In-progress task

  - Priority: HIGH
  - Dependencies: none
